00030 #include "Func.hpp"
00031 
00032 namespace SilentMedia {
00033   namespace Utils {
00034     string Func::toUpper(string strToConvert) {
00035       for (unsigned int i = 0; i != strToConvert.length(); ++i) {
00036         strToConvert[i] = toupper(strToConvert[i]);
00037       }
00038       return strToConvert;
00039     }
00040 
00041     string Func::toLower(string strToConvert) {
00042       for (unsigned int i = 0; i != strToConvert.length(); ++i) {
00043         strToConvert[i] = tolower(strToConvert[i]);
00044       }
00045       return strToConvert;
00046     }
00047 
00048     string Func::getFileNamefromFullPath(const string& str) {
00049       return (str.substr((str.find_last_of("/")) + 1));
00050     }
00051 
00052     string Func::getFolderNamefromFullPath(const string& str) {
00053       return (str.substr(0, str.find_last_of("/")));
00054     }
00055 
00056     string Func::getFileExtension(const string& fileName) {
00057       string file = getFileNamefromFullPath(fileName);
00058       return (file.substr((file.find_last_of(".")) + 1));
00059     }
00060 
00061     long Func::getFileSize(string inputFile) {
00062       long begin = -1;
00063       long end = -1;
00064       ifstream myfile(inputFile.c_str());
00065       begin = myfile.tellg();
00066       myfile.seekg(0, ios::end);
00067       end = myfile.tellg();
00068       myfile.close();
00069 
00070       return (end - begin);
00071     }
00072   }
00073 }
